pullRequest.title: JIT runtime helpers for get/put/withfield
pullRequest.bodyText:
JIT runtime helpers for get/put/withfield
Add new runtime helpers for flattened instance fields.
Fix incorrect helper prototype for withfield (shouldn't be no return)
Use internal calling convention on all platforms
Related to: #9627
Signed-off-by: Tobi Ajila atobia@ca.ibm.com

nodes.bodyText: This is the wrong kind of frame build - please follow the other examples in this file, don't try to be too clever re-using the NPE entrypoint.

nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -2455,6 +2455,15 @@ getFlattenableFieldSize(J9VMThread *currentThread, J9Class *fieldOwner, J9ROMFie
 UDATA
 arrayElementSize(J9ArrayClass* arrayClass);
 
+j9object_t

nodes.bodyText: These new functions also need doc.
This will need to be in the slow path (so all of the JIT registers are visible to the stack walker).

nodes.bodyText: This can simply build the frame and throw the exception without the extra checks (you can only get here in the NPE case). There's no possibility of reaching the putfield.
No need to pass the data to the slow path.
